original_title: Cent une tueries de zombies (101 Zombie Kills)
overview: It's exactly like Christian Marclay's "The Clock", except it's 98% shorter, it's not a deep meditation on our common human relationship with the passing of time (itself essentially only a human construct), and it has a LOT more skin-eating.
title: Cent une tueries de zombies (101 Zombie Kills)
